tool_description: Downloads and organizes hardware drivers for the specific system configuration from manufacturer websites and driver repositories to ensure post-installation hardware functionality.

hardware_profile.description: Hardware profile data from system hardware scanner

target_os.description: Target operating system for driver compatibility

download_location.description: Local directory path to store downloaded drivers

include_optional_drivers.description: Whether to include optional and enhancement drivers

verify_signatures.description: Whether to verify digital signatures of downloaded drivers

create_offline_installer.description: Whether to create offline driver installation package

error_messages: Invalid hardware profile: Provide valid hardware profile data from System Hardware Scanner.
Unsupported target OS: Specify a supported operating system version.
Download location inaccessible: Ensure the specified directory path exists and is writable.
Driver download failed: Unable to download drivers for one or more hardware components.
Invalid driver category: Use supported categories like Graphics, Audio, Network, Chipset, Storage.
Signature verification failed: One or more drivers failed digital signature verification.
Offline installer creation failed: Unable to create offline driver installation package.
usage: Provide hardware_profile from hardware scanner and specify target_os. Choose download_location with sufficient space. Include essential driver_categories for basic functionality. Enable verify_signatures for security.

drivers_downloaded.description: Number of driver packages successfully downloaded

total_download_size_mb.description: Total size of downloaded drivers in megabytes

driver_categories_found.description: List of driver categories successfully downloaded

missing_drivers.description: List of hardware components without available drivers

offline_installer_path.description: Path to created offline driver installation package
